text: Lana Del Rey has stepped on the Grammy ’ s red carpet in a crystal starburst - embellished Gucci gown with short hair bob in which she looked completely stunned. The singer has made her debut in 2011 with ‘ Video Games ’, her stylised cinematic voice and songs references have been personified with the usage of makeup. Lana ’ s retro style, including cat - eye makeup and her American influential hairstyles, a standout on the red carpet with glamour. Like her sound, her signature has remained consistent as well as unique. In the honour of her nomination for Best Pop Album of the Year, this year the singer has appeared on the 2018 Grammys Awards red carpet with her signature look.
